title: Beyond De Sade 1979 - Marilyn Chambers  - Rare Classic XXX
description:
TITLE: Beyond De Sade
YEAR: 1979
Cast: Marilyn Chambers, Erica Boyer, Tana Robinson

The history of Beyond de Sade is as grainy and faded as the few existing copies of this S&M-themed short.
This short was produced in 1979 at the O'Farrell Theater in San Francisco by Cinema 7, the Mitchell Brothers' film company.
Beyond de Sade was filmed in the Kopenhagen Live! Room and featured Marilyn discussing various bondage delights followed by scenes of intense kink, including a notable scene showing Marilyn taking on five large anal beads.
This short was only available through direct mail order from the Mitchell Brothers.
It was likely available on 8MM and/or 16MM film first before being converted to VHS.

The quality of this video isn't very high, but it's currently the best you can find.
